title: Figure Of America, ca. 1725–50
creditline: Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde
description: Standing female figure, wearing feather headdress and short skirt, and leaning on bow. A quiver is suspended on the left shoulder and held with the right hand. Tree trunk in back. Incised: "DV."

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure Of America, ca. 1725–50.
ca. 1725–50. Soft-paste porcelain. Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde. 1960-1-65.
